text: The track was called out for being ` ` tone - deaf'' Rita Ora has released a video for her controversial track ‘ Girls ’. The song – which also features Cardi B, Charli XCX and Bebe Rexha – was released last month. It quickly faced backlash from the LGBTQ + community, with pop singer Hayley Kiyoko and R & B artist Kehlani criticising the track for being “ downright tone - deaf. ” Kiyoko later released a statement claiming that the song “ does more harm than good for the LGBTQ + community ” and Kehlani hit out at the song for its “ harmful lyrics ”.
